bug.author: chengtbf
bug.summary: CUDNN Error when run resnet50 on multi node (n > 2)
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ShawnXuan>@ShawnXuan</denchmark-link> Try run resnet50 on multi node for benchmark in LeiNao machines. OneFlow work well on single node and double node, but will get BUG when node number is 3 or 4. Here is error log: <denchmark-code>F0806 23:42:58.183782 54414 cuda_util.cpp:97] Check failed: error == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (9 vs. 0) CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED </denchmark-code>
OneFlow can run BERT squard job on 4 node 32 GPU.

comments.comment: I guess the reason for the bug is that we may have problems with the conv2d algorithm of CUDNN in the multi machine environment?
I used to test 3 nodes with 24 gpus on v0.1.6, no error.
